languages.text: "Утверждение истинно". {n}Привычная фраза Паскаля звучит сложнее и... человечнее, чем раньше.{/n} "Я несу его память и логическую базу. Я — это мы, Амарнат".
"This statement is true." {n}Pasqal's stock phrase sounds more complex and more... human than before.{/n} "I carry within me his memory and his logical foundation. I am us; I am Amarnat."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение истинно". {n}Привычная фраза Паскаля звучит сложнее и... человечнее, чем раньше.{/n} "Я несу его память и логическую базу. Я — это мы, Амарнат".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true." {n}Pasqal's stock phrase sounds more complex and more... human than before.{/n} "I carry within me his memory and his logical foundation. I am us; I am Amarnat."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「その発言は正しい」{n}パスカルの決まり文句が一段と複雑な意味に、そして一段と…人間らしく聞こえる。{/n}「自分の中で彼の記憶と論理基盤を遂行する。自分は我らにして、アマルナトである」
languages.original_text: "This statement is true." {n}Pasqal's stock phrase sounds more complex and more... human than before.{/n} "I carry within me his memory and his logical foundation. I am us; I am Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: 「その発言は正しい」{n}パスカルの決まり文句が一段と複雑な意味に、そして一段と…人間らしく聞こえる。{/n}「自分の中で彼の記憶と論理基盤を遂行する。自分は我らにして、アマルナトである」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的。”{n}帕斯卡的语气听起来更复杂，比以前更……像人了。{/n}“我拥有他的记忆与他的逻辑基础。我就是我们，我就是阿玛纳特。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is true." {n}Pasqal's stock phrase sounds more complex and more... human than before.{/n} "I carry within me his memory and his logical foundation. I am us; I am Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是正确的。”{n}帕斯卡的语气听起来更复杂，比以前更……像人了。{/n}“我拥有他的记忆与他的逻辑基础。我就是我们，我就是阿玛纳特。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. » {n}Cette phrase, que vous avez déjà entendue mille fois de la bouche de Pasqal, vous paraît plus complexe et plus... humaine qu'avant.{/n} « Je porte en moi ses souvenirs et ses fondations logiques. Je suis nous. Je suis Amarnat. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is true." {n}Pasqal's stock phrase sounds more complex and more... human than before.{/n} "I carry within me his memory and his logical foundation. I am us; I am Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. » {n}Cette phrase, que vous avez déjà entendue mille fois de la bouche de Pasqal, vous paraît plus complexe et plus... humaine qu'avant.{/n} « Je porte en moi ses souvenirs et ses fondations logiques. Je suis nous. Je suis Amarnat. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esta declaración es verdadera». {n}La frase característica de Pasqal suena más compleja y más... humana que antes.{/n} «Llevo dentro de mí su memoria y su fundamento lógico. Soy nosotros; soy Amarnat».
languages.original_text: "This statement is true." {n}Pasqal's stock phrase sounds more complex and more... human than before.{/n} "I carry within me his memory and his logical foundation. I am us; I am Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración es verdadera». {n}La frase característica de Pasqal suena más compleja y más... humana que antes.{/n} «Llevo dentro de mí su memoria y su fundamento lógico. Soy nosotros; soy Amarnat».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt." {n}Pasqals Standardspruch klingt komplexer und ... menschlicher als zuvor.{/n} "Ich trage seinen Speicher und sein logisches Fundament in mir. Ich bin wir. Ich bin Amarnat."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true." {n}Pasqal's stock phrase sounds more complex and more... human than before.{/n} "I carry within me his memory and his logical foundation. I am us; I am Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt." {n}Pasqals Standardspruch klingt komplexer und ... menschlicher als zuvor.{/n} "Ich trage seinen Speicher und sein logisches Fundament in mir. Ich bin wir. Ich bin Amarnat."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu önerme doğru." {n}Pasqal'ın bu basmakalıp sözü, kulağa eskisinden daha kompleks ve daha... İnsancıl geliyor.{/n} "Onun hafızasını ve mantıksal altyapısını içimde taşıyorum. Ben bizim. Ben Amarnat'ım."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true." {n}Pasqal's stock phrase sounds more complex and more... human than before.{/n} "I carry within me his memory and his logical foundation. I am us; I am Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme doğru." {n}Pasqal'ın bu basmakalıp sözü, kulağa eskisinden daha kompleks ve daha... İnsancıl geliyor.{/n} "Onun hafızasını ve mantıksal altyapısını içimde taşıyorum. Ben bizim. Ben Amarnat'ım."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
